Developer docs¶

The easiest way to start developing python-future is as follows:

  1. Install Anaconda Python distribution

  2. Run:

    conda install -n future2 python=2.7 pip
conda install -n future3 python=3.4 pip

git clone https://github.com/PythonCharmers/python-future

3. If you are using Anaconda Python distribution, this comes without a test module on Python 2.x. Copy Python-2.7.6/Lib/test from the Python source tree to ``~/anaconda/envs/yourenvname/lib/python2.7/site-packages/`.
